### Exercise 2

```{r}
pac_all %>%
  separate(
  country_parent,
  c("country", "parent"),
  sep = "/",
  remove = TRUE,
  extra = "merge"
)

pac_all <- pac_all %>%mutate(
  total = as.numeric(str_remove_all(total, "[\\$,]")),
  dems = as.numeric(str_remove_all(dems, "[\\$,]")),
  repubs = as.numeric(str_remove_all(repubs, "[\\$,]") ))



```
